section.title: Getting Help with the &opscon;
section.para: On each of the &opscon; pages there is a help menu that you can click on to take you to a help page specific to the console you are currently viewing.

listitem.para: Click the help menu option in the upper-right corner of the page, depicted by the question mark seen in the screenshot below.
Click the Get Help For This Page link which will open the help page in a new tab in your browser.
